title: Does Apple give a new iPhone as a replacement in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: My iphone 6+ had issues with mute (silent) button, the issue started after 6 months of purchase, the matter was reported to apple on exactly the last day of warranty 365th day, the executive opened the phone in front of me to check for any water damage, after being satisfied, the service centre took 3 days to bring up to a resolution and finally 3rd day i was given a brand new iphone, (without charger) as a free replacement, I submitted the phone to my nearest iphone service centre, i was not given refurbished as i confirmed and was assured that apple does not replace faulty phones with refurbisheded phones as the same is against the company policy, hope this helps, please don’t hesitate to ask for any clarification or further details of so required.

Hi, Apple do give new iPhone as a replacement of your existing device if repair cost of your iPhone is high or irrepairable. Also your iPhone should be in warranty period. They do not give refurbished phones as a replacement until and unless your iPhone model is too old. Like iPhone 5S in current scenario. If you are facing major issues with your iPhone and it is in warranty period then there are 50% chances that you will get a new iPhone as a replacement after thorough checking of your existing iPhone.

No. No where on earth does Apple give a new iPhone as replacement unless the issue occurs within 7 or 14 days (changes by country) of purchase. Beyond that, though Apple replaces the device when taken in with an issue, it would be a refurbished device.
Yeah , You Can Replace It But If Is There Any Genuine Problem And You Have To Pay Some Money To Replace Device. According To Model Price Is Already Defined For Each Particular Model !
Yes.. if it is under warranty..
